It is recommended to eat a variety of vegetables every day, including dark leafy greens, cruciferous vegetables, root vegetables, and legumes. Examples of vegetables to include in your diet are kale, spinach, broccoli, cauliflower, carrots, sweet potatoes, potatoes, beans, peas, lentils, and onions.

Eating a variety of vegetables every day is important for good health. Some of the best vegetables to include in your daily diet are leafy greens, such as kale, spinach, and Swiss chard, as well as cruciferous vegetables, such as broccoli, cauliflower, and Brussels sprouts.
